text:
MEMORANDUM.
TO:
FROM:
OFFICERS AND DIRECTORS OF NAEB
SEYMOUR N0 SIEGEL, PRESIDENT
Herewith, is a copy of a latter which is going out to
some 18,000 people throughout the United States,
including governors, congressmen and senators,
mayors, school superintendents, college and univerÂ¬
sity presidents, 5200 liaises in "Who's Who in America",
and the heads of all national organisations. Enclosed
with this letter will go the Jeffersonian Heritage brochure.
This is the sample of direct mail audience building activity
and promotion, and represents the first of a series of
Such efforts in connection with the FAE Adult Education
Project.
Your comments would be appreciated.
